For.from sentence: For word vectors we use Google 's publicly available embeddings , trained with word2vec on the 100 - billion - word News corpus .

dropout.effective at improving: generalization from the training to the test set

found.from sentence: We found dropout to be particularly effective at improving generalization from the training to the test set , and used 0.5 as the dropout probability .

used.from sentence: We used the Adam optimizer with the standard settings ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) and a learning rate of 0.003 .

To determine.from sentence: To determine the best hyperparameters we performed a grid search over 150 settings based on validation - set accuracy .
